statements: UPDATE images_videos SET image_url='new_image.jpg' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE images_videos SET video_url='new_video.mp4', timestamp='2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE images_videos SET image_url='new_image.jpg', video_url='new_video.mp4' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE images_videos SET video_url='updated_video.mp4', timestamp='2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE image_url='old_image.jpg';
UPDATE images SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE videos SET drone_id = 2, timestamp = '2022-10-16 10:45:00' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE images SET image_path = '/path/to/new_image.jpg', drone_id = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE videos SET timestamp = '2022-10-15 09:30:00', video_path = '/path/to/new_video.mp4' WHERE drone_id = 3 AND id = 2;
UPDATE Images SET image_url = 'new_image_url' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Drones SET status = 'Active' WHERE drone_name = 'Drone_A';
UPDATE Images SET image_url = '/images/img1.jpg' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE Drones SET location = 'New York' WHERE drone_name = 'Drone1'
UPDATE Images SET image_name = 'New Image Name' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE Drones SET drone_model = 'Model XYZ' WHERE drone_id = 3;
UPDATE Drones SET drone_name = 'New Drone Name', drone_type = 'Aerial' WHERE drone_id = 1;
UPDATE Surveillance SET video_id = 2, timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE surveillance_id = 1;
UPDATE images SET image_url = 'new_url' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE drones SET is_active = TRUE, drone_name = 'Updated Drone Name' WHERE drone_id = 3;
UPDATE images SET image_url = 'https://updated_url.com' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE drones SET is_active = FALSE, drone_name = 'New Drone Name' WHERE drone_id = 3;
